alert.note: Alert for Collingsworth; Donley; Gray; Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 18 at 8:02PM CDT until September 18 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Wheeler County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southeastern Gray County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northwestern Collingsworth County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northeastern Donley County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 801 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles northwest of Mclean, or 22 miles southeast of Pampa, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Mclean, Alanreed, and Kellerville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
